titles: A collection of such statutes as do enjoyn the observation of Lent, and other fish dayes throughout the year, with the reasons for enjoyning the same.
publisher: Entred and printed for R. Pawley, and are to be sold at the Rainbow in Fleetstreet,
notes: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
